data.message: Also they didn't take him... I don't think they have a legal reason to they said they gonna be back at it monday... They're trying to find things to stick against the wall... his dad even said none of this had to do with my parenting it's not illegal to not take medication for anxiety or depression and it isn't illegal to fire your care nurse... that's why people interview pediatricians when they have a baby it's hard to find the right people to work with.
